Title: Notifier for VB.NET (Visual Studio 2010)

Project Description
Notifier for vb.net is a simple control that allows users to show pop-up notifications within their applications.


Notifier for Vb.NET is Simply and completely addictive.



Easily create professional looking notifications for your projects, allowing users to get information like never before.
